name: PHASESpatialCategory
desc: Sound resonance effects for spatial mixing.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Initializes a spatial category with the given string.

items.name: static let directPathTransmission: PHASESpatialCategory
items.desc: A spatial category that refers to the unfiltered audio signal.

items.name: static let earlyReflections: PHASESpatialCategory
items.desc: A spatial category that refers to the earlier echoes along the duration of sound resonance.

items.name: static let lateReverb: PHASESpatialCategory
items.desc: A spatial category that refers to the later echoes along the duration of sound resonance.
